attributes.action: Sativex to be Widely Available for MS Suffers
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-wales-28810407

The NHS in Wales is first in the UK to fund a cannabis-based medicine for people with multiple sclerosis.
attributes.background: This petition is to ask the goverment to make Sativex widely available to people who have Multiple Sclerosis (MS) to ease the symptoms of MS spasticity, spasticity can have a significant impact on daily activities.
